alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:06PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm near Carey will lift north into the Pioneer Mountains through 800 PM MDT... At 703 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carey, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph, pea size hail, brief heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carey, Little Wood Reservoir and Garfield Ranger Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
